titleStmt.title: An alarum for ladyes by the Sieur de la Serre, historiographer of France ; nevvly turn'd out of Franch [sic] into English by Francis Hawkins, dravving on to the tenth yeare of his age.
titleStmt.author: La Serre, M. de (Jean-Puget), ca. 1600-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Chez Nicolas & Iean de la Coste, au mont S. Hilaire, à l'Escu de Bretagne,

notesStmt.note: Includes frontispiece portrait of author at age 10.
Imperfect: torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: Iean de la Coste, au mont S. Hilaire
